name: Jump Fight
description:
Jump Fight!  Conquer all platforms and stomp your enemy... literally.

Play with your friends and see who's the best fighter! Jump in all the platforms top win this simple and competitive game. Jump Fight is completly free! YEY!

Features:

  • Local gameplay: 2 players gameplay;
  • Gamepad suport
  • Original SFX and Soundtrack

Attention: Jump Fight collects gameplay data using Analytics. No user private data will be collected, only game information (e.g. number of stomps, game time, etc)

Made with Unity
